item_category: The HUAWEI P40 Lite E comes with the HUAWEI App Gallery and is not compatible with Google Play Store and Services. Featuring a 6.39-inch delicate Punch FullView Display, the HUAWEI P40 lite E delivers a broader view with 90.15 percent screen-to-body ratio for an all immersive experience. HUAWEI's innovative blind hole technology effectively covers the front camera beneath the screen, which achieves a smaller aperture and preserves screen integrity, so that it provides an optimal user experience with minimal disruption.
